1.content: What universe of The Walking Dead takes place in?
1.title: You are Now The Walking Dead!

info.brief_description: Write Stories about your Various favorite Apocalyptic survivors.
info.description:
Rules:
1. All Types of Walking Dead from Tv, Comic and Games & Novels are welcome.
2. Crossover is allowed.
3. Death is allowed in this.
4. Build a safe zone or group.
5. Protect your people.
6. Crossovers for all 4 are allowed.
7. No age Progression or Regression.
8. No inflations.
9. No Weight Gain.
10. Be prepared.
info.pretty_title: The Walking Dead: Fight for Survival
